title: Vel'koz Auto Attack bug
body: Whenever vel'koz attacks with his left or middle tentacle his animations freeze. If he attacks with his right tentacle they fix but stop once he attacks with the other two. Also worth mentioning is that if you AA right after using Q he goes into landshark mode and thats pretty funny tbh.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for reporting this! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
I main vel'koz, so this does effect me... but thankfully I'm good enough that it makes little game play difference unless i'm focusing to much on it
I've had this bug as well and both teams can see it , funny but annoying bug
